00044 GrUberTextureMgr::CreateUberTexture( const UPath& name, const void* tileUsageBitmap, const char* metaData,
00045                                                                          unsigned int metaDataSize )
00046 {
00049         UberTextureMap::iterator iter = _uberTextures.find( name );
00050         if ( iter != _uberTextures.end() )
00051                 return 0;
00052 
00054         GrUberTexture* texture = new GrUberTexture( name, tileUsageBitmap, metaData, metaDataSize );
00055 
00057         _uberTextures[ name ] = texture;
00058 
00060         return texture;
00061 }

00063 //----------------------------------------------------------
00064 URef< GrUberTexture >
00065 GrUberTextureMgr::GetUberTexture( const UPath& name )
00066 {
00068         UberTextureMap::iterator iter = _uberTextures.find( name );     
00069         if ( iter != _uberTextures.end() )
00070                 return iter->second;
00071 
00074         GrUberTexture* texture = new GrUberTexture( name );
00075 
00077         _uberTextures[ name ] = texture;
00078 
00080         return texture;
00081 }

00083 //----------------------------------------------------------
00084 void
00085 GrUberTextureMgr::CollectGarbage()
00086 {
00087         UberTextureMap::iterator iter = _uberTextures.begin();
00088         while ( iter != _uberTextures.end() )
00089         {
00090                 if ( iter->second->GetRef() == 1 )
00091                         iter = _uberTextures.erase( iter );
00092                 else
00093                         ++iter;
00094         }
00095 }
